title: Flipped Learning-Based Science Project Design: Customized Learning Models for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A customized course for small groups of working professionals in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Emphasis on practical, work-applicable content

learning_goals: Learners can master over 80% of scientific theories through video lectures provided in a flipped learning environment.
Learners can perform three or more project improvements through peer feedback and instructor coaching.
Learners can demonstrate scientific problem-solving skills by achieving an average of 85+ on formative assessments.
Learners can complete one science project deliverable applicable to real-world tasks through offline collaboration activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
